archimate:Device.name: Label Printer (LP)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Specimen labeling (laboratory), medication labeling (pharmacy), asset labeling, patient wristbands, supply chain management, equipment tracking, and inventory management.
Specifications:
• Print Resolution: o Minimum 300 dpi (dots per inch) for clear, readable text and accurate barcode printing. • Print Speed: o Minimum 4–6 inches per second (IPS), ensuring efficient throughput for busy clinical and administrative workflows. • Media Compatibility: o Thermal labels, wristbands, synthetic labels, waterproof labels, and paper labels (various sizes and materials). o Maximum media width: up to 4 inches, adjustable to smaller labels. • Connectivity Options: o USB 2.0 or USB 3.0 (for direct PC connection) o Ethernet (10/100Mbps) for reliable networked printing o Wi-Fi (802.11ac) o Bluetooth connectivity for wireless printing scenarios. • Operating System Support: o Windows 11, Windows 10, and Windows Server (full compatibility) o Compatibility with healthcare-specific systems and drivers. • Input/Output Options: o USB ports for direct PC connections o RJ-45 Ethernet port for network connectivity o Serial port for legacy systems integration. • Printhead Durability: o Rated for at least 1 million linear inches of printing, suitable for high-volume clinical and administrative environments. o Enclosure: Drop-resistant, with antimicrobial or wipeable casing. o Ingress Protection: IP54 protection for splash and dust resistance.
• Power Requirements:
o Battery Life: Minimum 8–10 hours per charge, covers a full clinical shift. o Charging: USB-C or proprietary dock. Fast charge supported. o Power Efficiency: Low idle power draw (<10W), under 60W in operation. • Size and Weight: o Size: Approx. 6–8 in (W) × 5–7 in (H) × 6–9 in (D) o Weight: Under 3 lbs, wearable with shoulder strap or belt clip.
• Software Compatibility:
o Compatible with existing Hospital Information Systems (HIS), Laboratory Information Management Systems (LIMS), Pharmacy management software, and inventory management platforms (e.g., NetSuite). o Supports common label design software (e.g., ZebraDesigner, NiceLabel, Bartender).
• Accessories and Protection:
o Protective casing for clinical environments. o Easy-clean, antimicrobial surface options available. o Self cleaning print head alerts o Mounting Options: Clip, shoulder strap, or cart-mounted holder o Protective Options: Antimicrobial casings, rugged outer shells for high contact areas
